mapper.select: SELECT A.product_code, B.convert_path, B.image_classification, A.product_name, A.price, D.name FROM tbl_product A LEFT JOIN tbl_product_img B ON (A.product_code = B.product_code) LEFT JOIN tbl_option_list C ON (A.product_code = C.product_code) LEFT JOIN tbl_option D ON (C.option_code = D.option_code) WHERE A.orderable_status = 'Y' AND B.image_status = 'Y' AND A.product_code = #{number} AND C.exposure_status = 'Y' AND C.stock > 0

SELECT AVG(A.grade / A.reviews) AS ReviewAvg, B.content, B.write_date, C.id, A.reviews FROM tbl_product A LEFT JOIN tbl_review B ON (A.product_code = B.product_code) LEFT JOIN tbl_user C ON (B.member_code = C.user_code) WHERE A.product_code = #{number} AND A.orderable_status = 'Y' AND B.state = 'Y'
